It is unclear how changes (mutations) in the DNA structure of the gene lead to the clinical findings.",NINDS,Coffin Lowry Syndrome
What are the treatments for Coffin Lowry Syndrome ?,"There is no cure and no standard course of treatment for Coffin-Lowry syndrome. Treatment is symptomatic and supportive, and may
